titleStmt.title: A godly garden out of which most comfortable herbs may be gathered for the health of the wounded conscience of all penitent sinners.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestreat at the signe of the Faucon] by H. Middleton,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and publication date from colophon.
This has Almanack for 1577-1588; begins on leaf F7v.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
